Educational Qualifications: B.A. Educated at Kendrapara College, Utkal University, Cuttack, Orissa
Other Information: Participated in various movements connected with the cause of students, teachers, farmers and youths; imprisoned for 19 months during Emergency, 1975-77
Name: Jena,Shri Srikant Kumar
Countries Visited: Burma, China, Egypt, France, Germany, Pakistan,South Africa, Sweden, Thailand and U.K. and U.S.A
Positions Held:
1977
President, State Yuva Janata, Orissa

1977-89
Member, Orissa Legislative Assembly (three times)
Member, Committee on Public Accounts, Committee on Public Undertakings, Library Committee and Committee on Environment

1979-80
Minister of State, Industry and Urban Development, Govt. of Orissa

1989
Elected to 9th Lok Sabha
General Secretary, J.D., Orissa

Apr. - Nov. 1990
Union Minister of State, Small Scale Industry, Agro and Rural Industries

1991
Elected to 10th Lok Sabha (2nd term)
Chairman, Committee on Science and Technology
Chief Whip, Janata Dal

1996
Elected to 11th Lok Sabha (3rd term)
Deputy Leader, Janata Dal
Union Cabinet Minister, Parliamentary Affairs and Tourism

2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (4th term)

2009
Union Minister of State, Chemicals and Fertilizers

July 2011 Onwards
Union Minister of State (Independent Charge), Chemicals and Fertilizers
Union Minister of State (Independent Charge), Statistics and Programme Implementation
